testcase.name: To check correct total price is being calculated as “price per night*no of days*no of rooms in Book a hotel page
testcase.system-out: Given user select option the location as "Melbourne"........................passed And user select option the hotel as "Hotel Sunshine"........................passed And user select option the roomtype as "Standard"...........................passed And user select option the noofroom as "2 - Two"............................passed And user select option the checkin date as "02/07/2019".....................passed And user select the option checkoutdate as "03/07/2019".....................passed And user enter the no of adult "1 - One"....................................passed And user enter th no of children "1 - One"..................................passed And user Enter the seach button.............................................passed And user select the hotel...................................................passed And user click on the continue button.......................................passed And user enter the first name "latha" in htoel booking page.................passed And user enter the last name "vinoth" in hotel booking page.................passed And user enter the billing adrress "villivakkam" in hotel booking page......passed And user enter the credit card no "9587364587651234"in the hotel booking page.passed And user select the credit card type "Master Card" in htoel booking page....passed And user select the expiry month "April" in the hotel booking page..........passed And user select the expiry year "2022" in the hotel booking page............passed And user enter the cvv number "123" in the hotel booking page...............passed And user click on the booknow button........................................passed Then Verify that total-price is being calculated as (price-pernight*no-ofrooms*no-of-days + 10% GST”).passed
